turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, where would you like to place your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks located on 59th and Beardsley.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, want did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like one espresso macchiato, solo, with 2% milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any additional sweeteners with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, I'll take a teaspoon of honey too please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When did you want to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll arrive in around 30 minutes so by 5:00 PM.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, Pickup at 5:00 PM then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you go over the order again please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I've got one espresso macchiato, solo, with 2% milk for pick up at Starbucks located at 59th and Beardsley.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your welcome, I will place the order now then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you might need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that is all, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a lovely day.
